H0.text: The woodpecker population in a forest area would produce more offspring if a housing development is built in that area.

H1.text: They would change the color of their feathers if a housing development is built in the forest area where the woodpecker population resides.

H2.text: They would experience a decrease in available food if a housing development is built in the forest area.

H3.text: They would experience a decrease in competition if a housing development is built in the forest area, affecting the woodpecker population.
